chapter.title: Deployment
chapter.para: Now that you have built the VDB, you are ready to deploy the VDB. Essentially once you deploy you can connect to VDB using JDBC connection. Note that there are two steps involved in this deployment
Federate Embedded can be deployed in a couple different scenarios.

listitem.para: In a JEE Application Server (Deploy and Create connection pool).

chapter.para: For this example purposes the stand-alone deployment explained below. However you can find more details about deploying to application servers on the Federate web-site

sect1.title: Stand-alone Application Deployment
sect1.para: Copy the "federate-${version}-embedded.jar" and all dependent jars in "lib" directory in your Java application's classpath along with your VDB.
